name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程內容包括熱量與質量傳送單元及其應用。
schedule:
1. Heat Transfer to Fluids with Phase Change
2. Radiation Heat Transfer
3. Heat-Exchange Equipment
4. Evaporation
5. Energy Transfer
6. Equilibrium-Stage Operations & Distillation
scorePolicy: 期中考試,期末考試與作業
materials: Unit operations of Chemical Engineering 7th edition by McCabe, Smith and Hariot.
